title: The Science of Attraction
description: Biologist Kate Ramsey can manage a burgeoning career in research, and a world-class lab full of large personalities, but her love life is chaos. Juggling a casual affair with the director of her institute, and a highly inappropriate crush on her newest recruit, she barely has time to think straight. When she gives in and chooses doing over thinking, things start to spin out of control.
author: Verity Jacobs
